.. _`design_system_components_objectcontent`:

ObjectContent
=============

.. figure:: images/component_objectcontent.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Plugin component that is able to display an actual file (e.g. jpeg, pdf, etc.) within a :ref:`design_system_components_contentblock`.

The component will find a plugin viewer component that is suitable for displaying the specific file given to the component and uses the filename as the heading for the Content Block component. If no file can be found or if the file can't be displayed, the component will display an error message.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.plugin_containers.ObjectContent.__default__`

:ref:`cs-web-components-pdf-PDFViewer.PDFViewer`

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.content_view_plugins.ImageViewer.ImageViewer`

------------------
